TEXT.TITLE: HELENE CURTIS <HC> SEES 2ND QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Helene Curtis Industries Inc said due to increased expenditures budgeted to promote its new Salon Sectives brand, the company will likely produce a loss for the second quarter ending August 31. In the 1986 second quarter it earned 1,947,000 or 53 cts a share. Earlier the cosmetics company posted first-quarter net of 139,000 or four cts a share versus a loss in the year-ago period of 799,000 or 22 cts a share. Reuter
